content.description:
Start under the roof with a good incut pizza slice/ tongue feature. Left hand on the rail just below it. Pull on a bit awkwardly using the large pedestal for feet, then make a few core intensive move up before leaping off the pedestal and taking a gnarly swing on a pair of slopers. Get it together and figure out how to top out.

 A sit-start on the pedestal adds a few funky and delicious moves into the established line.
content.location: This boulder problem is found on the large bulbous roof the juts out and towers over "The Movie Gallery".

climbs.name: Two little piggies go to Clough

content.description: Sit start matched on an obvious incut rail on the face with a massive foot hold. Make a few easier moves trending up and right then it’s a crux big move to a right hand jug side pull. Once you stick this, stay tight and find a crystal intermediate before powering up lefty to the slopey lip. Ride the lip for a few moves and top out!
content.location: This is the center line of the overhanging face that exits to the right. The left exit might be a little easier, it’s definitely a worse fall zone.

content.description: This little problem shares the same start as 2 little piggies but it climbs to the left instead of right. You can ride the lip all the way to the same top out as piggies or mantle directly. The movement feels classic but the landing isn’t perfect, there are a couple small boulders and then a 6 foot drop where your spotter can stand to prevent you from rolling down if you blow the big move to the lip.
content.location: North side of the 5-0 block sit starting on the obvious crimp rail on the center of the boulder.

content.description: This is an awesome overhanging boulder with some good rock quality that hosts a few great moderate problems and a roof project.
